cl_site Struct Reference
[clio]

Data Fields

struct lu_site cs_lu

 Statistical counters.
atomic_t cs_pages_state [CPS_NR]

Detailed Description

Client-side site.

This represents particular client stack. "Global" variables should (directly or indirectly) be added here to allow multiple clients to co-exist in the single address space.

struct cache_stats cl_site::cs_pages [read]

Statistical counters.

Atomics do not scale, something better like per-cpu counters is needed.

These are exported as /proc/fs/lustre/llite/.../site

When interpreting keep in mind that both sub-locks (and sub-pages) and top-locks (and top-pages) are accounted here.

Definition at line 1917 of file cl_object.h.

Referenced by cl_site_init(), and cl_site_stats_print().
